name: Blue Flowery Sketch Frilled Maxi
description: Flowing maxi skirt featuring a delicate flower sketch design with frilled edges, perfect for a soft, feminine look.

name: Sunny Days Retro Wide-Leg
description: Embrace vintage flair with these retro-inspired wide-leg pants, designed for a relaxed and stylish vibe. Perfect for adding an indie touch to your wardrobe.

name: Yellow Floral Fish Tail
description: A lovely yellow floral skirt with a fish tail hem and an elastic waistband for a comfortable, flattering fit. Ideal for a countryside-inspired look.
